channel.title: Questions (MTP V2) -Again-
channel.description:
Hello please help..
How do i add overloads? How do i delete it that i click on a level and raise the stat.. I cant drop/sell/lose my (on death/pvp) chaotics how do i change that? Is there a auto deregister thing? How do i got xp from killing monsters Someone got the right ints for chaotic crossbow?
Ty...
